ModMetaData.name: [ATW] Ridiculous Cat Variety
ModMetaData.author: MG_Atwood
ModMetaData.description:
Ever felt your colonists need more cat colours in their lives? Now they can have a ridiculous number! This mod adds over 80 realistic cat coat variations so even Cat 43 can feel special.
This mod shouldn't affect cat variants added by other mods, only the vanilla cats. Load after Animal Variety Coats, Vanilla Textures Expanded, Erin's Cat Overhaul or any other texture-altering mods that affect vanilla cats.
Best used with the Camera+ mod.
